abstract: World Anti-Doping Agency suspends Kazakhstan’s antidoping lab; action follows organization's decision to suspend laboratory that was supposed to handle drug testing at 2016 Rio Olympics.

headline.print_headline: Doping; Kazakhstan Lab Is the Latest to Be Suspended by WADA
headline.main: Drug Testing Lab in Kazakhstan Is Suspended

snippet: It was the sixth suspension announced by the World Anti-Doping Agency in the past three months, a period of unprecedented disciplinary action.
lead_paragraph: It was the sixth suspension announced by the World Anti-Doping Agency in the past three months, a period of unprecedented disciplinary action.
